verbs.description: coruscate (third-person singular simple present coruscates, present participle coruscating, simple past and past participle coruscated)

entries.meaning: (intransitive) To give off light; to reflect in flashes; to sparkle.
examples: Synonyms: glean, glimmer, glisten, glitter, radiate, scintillate, sheen, shine, sparkle, twinkle

entries.meaning: (intransitive, figurative) To exhibit brilliant technique or style.
